landing.description: I'm an software engineer based in Austin, TX. I love to build and develop audio-related software, whether its plugins or game audio engines.

description: Hello! I'm Matthew, a passionate and energetic software engineer based out of Austin, TX who loves to solve creative and technical problems.

I strive to develop clean and neatly architected code solutions for games, a problem that is unique to every individual project. If the project and team environment permits, I like to couple these skills with mybackground in music and sound to creative dynamic and immersive sounds for the game, each of which is precisely implemented using scripts and middleware (if necessary).

landing.description: I'm a software engineer based in Austin, TX. I enjoy developing games, whether it's audio programming or technical sound design.
